body.p: To meet the criterion in paragraph 42(a), an entity must currently have a legally enforceable right of set‑off. This means that the right of set‑off:

li.p: must not be contingent on a future event; and
must be legally enforceable in all of the following circumstances:
the event of insolvency or bankruptcy
of the entity and all of the counterparties.
